h1_title: How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor
h2_title: How to Unlock Zodiac Village in The Painted Realm
content: Head into the water to meet Chen Loong, and a fight will automatically begin with Admiral Bajie helping you out. When it's done, he won't be very happy and he'll exclaim that only one of Xu Dog's pills can save him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Zodiac_Village_and_Upgrade_Armor.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor', specifically from the subsection 'How to Unlock Zodiac Village in The Painted Realm'.
The content is as follows:
Head into the water to meet Chen Loong, and a fight will automatically begin with Admiral Bajie helping you out. When it's done, he won't be very happy and he'll exclaim that only one of Xu Dog's pills can save him.
